name: Verify required airports have complete information
description:
This test verifies that the required airports not only exist but also
have complete and valid information in their attributes.

steps.name: Get required airports and expected fields
Fetch airports and find required ones
Validate attribute completeness for each required airport

parameters.name: data
parameters.value: {'required_airports_count': 3, 'validation_results': [{'name': 'Akureyri Airport', 'id': 'AEY', 'has_attributes': True, 'attribute_count': 9, 'missing_fields': [], 'present_fields': ['name', 'id', 'iata', 'icao', 'name', 'city', 'country', 'timezone', 'latitude', 'longitude']}, {'name': 'St. Anthony Airport', 'id': 'YAY', 'has_attributes': True, 'attribute_count': 9, 'missing_fields': [], 'present_fields': ['name', 'id', 'iata', 'icao', 'name', 'city', 'country', 'timezone', 'latitude', 'longitude']}, {'name': 'CFB Bagotville', 'id': 'YBG', 'has_attributes': True, 'attribute_count': 9, 'missing_fields': [], 'present_fields': ['name', 'id', 'iata', 'icao', 'name', 'city', 'country', 'timezone', 'latitude', 'longitude']}]}

steps.name: Assert all required airports have adequate information
